_sText: THERE IS A NEW VERSION[ HERE](http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/156619 "HERE")!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Please do not download this version any longer, just left up for reference! ================================================================================================================================================================================================================= ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Credits! Greyfrog Design - Shrine Roof, Door Frames, Stair Arches Ownt - Prop Reskinning Karatekaefer - Skybox texture chizbone - Custom nav file Misto - rest of brushwork, texturing, lighting, optimization, and radar overlay Nintendo - Original Layout/Concept Ruff - Stair Prefab Nosoul - Screenshots cncr - textures Koji Kondo - Original Sounds ----------------------------------------------- ***Updated with some bug fixes*** I modeled this map very closely after the Gerudo Valley Fortress found in The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. The layout of the fortress is very similar, I only had to change one or two small things as the dimensions didn't quite match up. The Counter-terrorists start half near the gate, the others by the stairs. The terrorist start outside, at the top of the fortress. It may seem a bit unbalanced between teams. However after testing with people and bots, it was actually pretty even most of the time. There are four hostages, the difference is they are spread out unlike most Hostage Rescue maps. The hostages are located the same place as the hostage in Ocarina of Time, to keep with the accuracy of the map. The map also includes, a custom nav file (Thanks Chizbone) and Radar Overlay (Thanks Ownt). ------------------------------------------------ Easter Eggs! There is a lever on one of the walls outside. When puled, you will hear the Sounds of Storms. and the fairy fountain will open up. The radio, near the fruit crates outside, can change music, just press use on the front of it, to go from the Goron Mountain music, to the Koroki Shop music. All radio that play music, will stop if they take damage. ------------------------------------------------ I did not pack all the custom files in the bsp. This would have made the map file size way to large. Also this is in case server admins don't want to include the custom sounds, decals, or radar for any reason. If you redistribute this map elsewhere, make sure you keep the credits there, You do not need to have this whole Readme, but everyone should be credited for their role in this map. Hope you enjoy the map UPDATE I went through my older maps and found some errors with packing or outdated files and whatnot, so I added a new download with everything packed. It made the map quite large but its alot easier to handle now. Enjoy!
